sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: The line interpolator interpolates supplied nodes (see InterpolateLine) with line segments. The finess of the curve may be controlled using SetMaximumCurveError and SetMaximumNumberOfLineSegments.
To create an instance of class vtkLinearContourLineInterpolator, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkLinearContourLineInterpolator

sect1.title: Methods
